doc.after: The theology of the Seventh day Adventist Church largely resembles that of mainstream Protestant Christianity and in particular evangelicalism Most significantly Adventists believe in the authority of both Scripture and Ellen G White and teach that salvation comes through faith in Jesus Christ The 28 fundamental beliefs constitute the church s official doctrinal position
